events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because the product is not what I paid for.
The case has been categorized under 'Refund' due to the customer's request for money back following a wrong delivery.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle this refund request to ensure prompt resolution.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help get this sorted out for you as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and a copy of your order confirmation to process the refund?
I have attached a photo of the item and the order confirmation email as requested. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and provide a prepaid label to return the incorrect item.
Thank you very much for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the help and look forward to the refund.
The refund has been processed and the return label sent to your email. We consider this case resolved, but please contact us if you have further questions.
We are following up to ensure you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with regarding your recent order.
Closing this support case as resolved due to completed refund process and positive customer feedback.
